title: KateyKhaos im SO SO MAD AT YOU
body:
Its the pre season for god sakes and illaoi hasn't even seen a daylight of skin in 22 patches!
IM DONE WITH UR SUSPENSE, WHEN IS IT COMING OUT?!

replies.body: I heard that her father past away....
Yeah, he did - on the 18th. I've been quiet on the boards. ;_; Sorry about that. Trying to get back into the swing of things.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ndnFpE9w,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-11-01T20:13:48.246+0000)
>
> Yeah, he did - on the 18th. I've been quiet on the boards. ;_; Sorry about that. Trying to get back into the swing of things.

Sorry to hear about that.  It takes awhile to adjust after losing a parent.
Thank you. It does, I'm trying to get back into everything, especially with Elementalist Lux nearing completion and she's been my baby for nearly a year now, haha.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ndnFpE9w,comment-id=0001000000010000,timestamp=2016-11-11T20:01:25.803+0000)
>
> Thank you. It does, I'm trying to get back into everything, especially with Elementalist Lux nearing completion and she's been my baby for nearly a year now, haha.

That must be extra stressful.

Was Ele Lux your idea to begin with?
Certainly not my brain child, but I've been QA on her for over a year!
You climbed with Nami, and now you're going to tilt kids with Lux?
Aww sorry to hear that :(  Hope things get better.
Thanks. <3
Sorry for your loss dear <3

> [{quoted}](name=Hiemal,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ndnFpE9w,comment-id=000100000006,timestamp=2016-12-10T01:36:54.032+0000)
>
> Sorry for your loss dear <3

Thank you. <3
welcome back aniway :)
Thank you!
Jesus I'm sorry to hear that.
Thanks. <3

Sorry that you had to return to such a violent, ignorant post. Some people need to learn that there's a human behind the computer screen with actual real-life issues. If we all could think like that, Riot wouldn't need the "report" option.
It's all good. :) Can't make everyone happy. Honestly, I'd rather be the bearer of bad news than give a copy pasta reply.

Jeez. Look, all i was doing was getting to know when the next skin is out. I know that you have ur porblems maam, and thats why all i wanna say is im sorry for ur loss. If that means go through 2 years with no illaoi skin, thats fine by me. ðŸ™‚

You can be mad at me, but I'm not the one making the calls on this one. :) I just make sure the content coming out functions properly and looks nice. Seriously, though. We are aware she needs another skin, just like Jhin. Please be patient with us!
So inconsiderate...
Zac has 2 skins and is out for years. Same for Yorick. Also Special weapon zac is Well lets say he definetly is a Special little skin
TBF his chromas are the best chromas...
Nah, Bard has the best ones
His model is so special that's why XDD  kind of like Zyra.  Awesome champs but take immense amount of time for them to work on.

P.s. i rly didnt meant to be violent at all. It was just capitals to be noticed, no emphasis on them. I know a rioter is a human, and thats why all i can say is as long as she assures me or anyone else askign for skins, its totally cool. Im sorry for any inconvenience. Especially any inconveniance to RiotKateyKhaos. ðŸ˜”

I accept your apology for one, becuase man that thread made me want to say some things to you about manners when you first posted it lol.

But I'm just glad you came around to apologize, even risking bringing this subject up again.

Better late than never after all.
